title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 6.6 - Hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 6.6 - Hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

The department shall accept requests for records and produce
records during regular business hours, which are 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday
through Friday, at Building 2, State Campus, Albany, NY 12226; and 8:30 a.m. to
3:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, at a correctional facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
6.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
